channel.title: R.I.P Hostile
channel.description: Hostile died last week, for those who dont know, he was a firefighter irl, and on the way to a fire his truck was involved in a crash which left him paralyzed from the neck down, he suffered a heart attack while in the hospital on thursday which was the cause of his death. He may not of been well liked in the rsc priv server community but for those who were his friend i thought yall should know.

Is his last name bruce
[/quote] no sir, you are thinking of the wrong guy.

love you mona bb
[/quote][/quote]
love you guise miss you

item.title: R.I.P Hostile

item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

if this is the same guy witch im sure it is he been in a chair for years from that fire and he was a good guy and a good pker and he believe he only had one hand and still raped my ass:( r.i.p again he will be missed

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P Hostile
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:26, topic:482654”][quote author=yong min link=topic=600887.msg4226248#msg4226248 date=1361023603]

what the fudge is this true? Pat was a good friend hasn’t been online for a while, i knew he was quite sick but didnt hear anything about a car crash? verification please, i dont want to tell alot of Pats good online freinds this if it was not true.

for people who dont know who he is, he admined/owned DGB PK/RSClite with Billy/XSmoke last year or the year before, almost been around the rsc private server community since the era rsca/rsce first started,or even before but thats where i met him.

was a good guyy, helped alot of people out anyway he could, especialy Billy they were/are very close, close as u can get without ever actually meeting the person. wish to god this is a fake, or the OP got the wrong information somehow.

miss u brother. RIP
Kurupt

Hayden, as much as I really did hope this wasn’t true, sadly it is true and Pat has passed away.

I really wish I got more chance to speak with Pat,he was my best friend and I could of never asked for anything or anyone better, he was such a caring and kind guy, he will be greatly missed.

Rest in peace Patrick I hope we meet again some day.

Billy, is this Danish Patrick?
[/quote]
Nope, Danish Patrick is still lurking about :)[/quote]

Ah. I was going to say! Nonetheless, I didn’t know this guy but RIP.

Read full topic
